title: site loading increadably slow
content:
Hey, I know I'm new to Typophile but, I was wondering if anybody else was having a problem with the web site lately?  
I just found Typophile about 4 weeks ago and while I lurked for a week I didn't have any problems loading the site whenever I wanted.  
The first week after I signed up for membership I didn't have any trouble.  
Except for only one day last week, I have had nothing but problems loading and navigating the Typophile web site.  
I keep getting time out messages saying something about site availability or that it may be down for maintenance.  
Is this the case or is it all on my end?  
I know my computer is not the newest but, I never have trouble like this anywhere else I go.  
I was assuming it was google trying to punish me for not switching to crome....  
Either way it is getting irritating to say the least.  
Any thoughts?  
Thanks.  
Merl
author: Merl

comments.content: Yes. It took me 15 minutes of refreshing to load the site successfully just to post this comment. Constantly getting 500 Internal Server Error/503 Service Temporarily Unavailable.
